pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### pytest-embedded-qemupytest embedded service for running tests on QEMU instead of the real target.Extra Functionalities:=== "`pytest-embedded-idf` activated" - `app`: create the qemu bootable image automatically by the built binaries. - `qemu`: enable the fixture - `dut`: duplicate the `qemu` output to `pexpect_proc`.=== "`pytest-embedded-idf` NOT activated" - `qemu`: enable the fixture - `dut`: duplicate the `qemu` output to `pexpect_proc`.Used CLI Options:- `qemu-image-path`- `qemu-prog-path`- `qemu-cli-args`- `qemu-cli-extra-args`- `qemu-log-path`
